name: FUNDACIÓN REGO
about: At FUNDACIÓN REGO flying school, we are dedicated to providing comprehensive and professional aviation training. Our programs are designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to become proficient pilots, whether pursuing a career in commercial aviation or personal flying. We offer a structured curriculum that includes both theoretical and practical training, adhering to the highest standards set by aviation authorities. Our experienced instructors and modern facilities ensure a safe and effective learning environment. We guide our students through every step of their training, from initial medical examinations and registration to job placement upon completion. Our goal is to produce well-rounded, competent pilots ready for a successful career in aviation. With a strong focus on safety, professionalism, and career development, FUNDACIÓN REGO flying school is your pathway to the skies.
